shape_0_per_frame6=g=abs(sin(mid*200+time));

shape_0_per_frame9=

per_frame_1=warp =0;
per_frame_2=dx=0.050+((sin(time)*0.5+0.5)*0.1);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=zoom=.99
per_pixel_1=myx = (x-q1)*2;
per_pixel_2=myy= (y-q2)*2;
per_pixel_3=myrad = (myx*myx) + (myy*myy);
per_pixel_4=dx = 0.1*(myy/(myrad+1));
per_pixel_5=dy = -0.1*(myx/(myrad+1));
per_pixel_6=zoom=.9999;
per_pixel_7=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_10=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_11=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_pixel_12=zoom = zoom + (0.05 + 0.04*sin(time))*(0.2*sin(ang*time));
per_pixel_13=rot = rot + 0.01*(0.5*cos(ang*5*bass*time));
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=dx = dx + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dx_r;
per_pixel_16=dy = dy + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dy_r;
per_pixel_17=rot=0.1*pow(-ang,3)-1.18*sin(ang);
per_pixel_18=zoom=1.45*sin(-rad)+1.3+ sin(rad);
per_pixel_19=dx = dx + 0.09*sin(q8*0.785);
per_pixel_20=dy = dy + 0.09*sin(q8*0.675);
per_pixel_21=//zoom = zoom +q7;
